subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Cincyghosthunter's Files/Snow Hill C C 03a.mp3 
  Uploaded by : cincyghosthunter <cincyparanormal@...> 
  Description : Native American EVP recorded at Snow Hill Country Club  

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Cincyghosthunter%27s%20Files/Snow%20Hill%20C%20C%2003a.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/forms/general.htmlfiles

Regards,

cincyghosthunter <cincyparanormal@...>
